wiki_links.wiki:
You can find our wiki here:
<https://github.com/lucko/LuckPerms/wiki>
wiki_links.install:
You can install LuckPerms on Spigot/Paper, Sponge, BungeeCord/Waterfall, Velocity and others!
Read the installation page on the wiki for more info:
<https://github.com/lucko/LuckPerms/wiki/Installation>
wiki_links.bungee:
You have to download and install LuckPerms-Bungee on your BungeeCord to manage BungeeCord permissions.
LuckPerms-Bungee does **not** manage permissions on Spigot!
Read this page for more info:
<https://github.com/lucko/LuckPerms/wiki/Network-Installation>
wiki_links.sync:
To sync data between servers, you need to connect each LuckPerms plugin to the same database (for example MySQL) and set up a messaging service
<https://github.com/lucko/LuckPerms/wiki/Syncing-data-between-servers>
wiki_links.usage:
Here's a guide to help you understand and use LuckPerms!
<https://github.com/lucko/LuckPerms/wiki/Usage>
wiki_links.errors:
Here's a page with some common storage system errors.
<https://github.com/lucko/LuckPerms/wiki/Storage-system-errors>
wiki_links.editor:
LuckPerms offers an easy to use, powerful Web Editor, with which you can add, delete and change permissions of groups and players.
You can find more info here:
<https://github.com/lucko/LuckPerms/wiki/Web-Editor>
wiki_links.verbose:
LuckPerms provides a verbose command to help you find out what permissions a command/plugin is checking.
More info can be found here:
<https://github.com/lucko/LuckPerms/wiki/Verbose>
wiki_links.meta:
You can set prefixes, suffixes and other meta in LuckPerms for players and groups.
Note that LuckPerms does **not** manage chat. You need to use another plugin to show prefixes/suffixes in chat!
<https://github.com/lucko/LuckPerms/wiki/Prefixes,-Suffixes-&-Meta>
wiki_links.context:
You can set a permission or group on a per-world/per-server basis, through "contexts".
More info can be found here:
<https://github.com/lucko/LuckPerms/wiki/Context>
wiki_links.default:
LuckPerms provides a group that every player is added tp upon joining the server, called `default`.
You can use multiple methods to change the default group or change the name of it - to find out more please read this wiki page:
<https://github.com/lucko/LuckPerms/wiki/Default-Groups>
